apple_vendor_description: The medium-dark skin tone mage emoji on Apple devices radiates an aura of mystical power and ancient wisdom.  He is depicted with flowing robes rendered in rich, deep colors, accentuated by Apple's signature glossy 3D shading that suggests texture and movement.  Holding a glowing staff or orb, the realistic lighting effects cast an ethereal glow, making this emoji a perfect representation of magic, fantasy, and the pursuit of knowledge or enchantment in messages.
